Package com.checkersgame

Class CheckersGameClient

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
com.checkersgame.ui.CheckersGUI
com.checkersgame.CheckersGameClient
public class CheckersGameClient extends CheckersGUI
This is the client class to connect to the server and plays againest somebody else on the server. Extends the checkers gui

    • receiveInfoFromServer

      private void receiveInfoFromServer() throws Exception
      waits to for the server to send the inputted move from the opponent. Once done so, waits the player input and send it back
      Throws:
      Exception
